love hate

No matter how much i hate you i will always love you just that little bit more
When i see you upset all i want to do is run straight up to you, hug you and never let you go
But i know in my heart this could never happen
You are my best friend even though we have our differences i still love you and i also think that you may even be my one true love my soul mate
No matter how much i try to deney these feelings the love defeats all and i end up likeing you more and its tearing my heart up every day

my life

I sit here just wishing i could get out of here
I can't take it any more
I need to get out, i need somewhere to go
I get treated like i am nothing just a
piece of grass or something which i am not
I get punched in the back of the head,
I get wacked on my arms, my body aches form it
I fear i may end up with damage to me emotionally and psychology when im older
All i want is for all my pain and worries to go away
I get depressed from them
I want to run away and never look back
Living here i fear for my life because i know if
I stay any longer i will end up doing something
stupid
I don't feel safe and i won't until i get out

Missing Brisbane gurl??? 19 years old

19 year old Coie Wilson, went missing from The valley nightclub, the family, on friday night/saturday morning.

Authorities are appealing for public help to find a 19-year-old south-east Queensland woman missing since Saturday night.

Police say Coie Wilson became separated from friends at a nightclub in Brisbane's Fortitude Valley early on Saturday morning before leaving with an unknown person.

She spoke to her mother by phone about lunchtime on Saturday and made arrangements to be home at Ipswich, west of Brisbane by 8:00pm AEST.

Ms Wilson was last seen on Mt Nebo Road, on Brisbane's westside at about 10:20pm AEST on Saturday, telling a witness her van had broken down and she was trying to contact her family.

She has not been seen since.

Police found her abandoned van on Mount Nebo Road the following morning and say Ms Wilson's purse, money and identification were in the van.

what a fool i am.

so sad

Girl: slow down, i'm scared

Guy: No, this is fun.

Girl: No it's not. Please it's too scary!

Guy: Then tell me you love me.

Girl: Fine I love you. Slow down!

Guy: Now give me a BIG hug.

Girl : *hugs him*

Guy: Can you take my helmet off and put it on yourself? It's bugging me.

Girl: Alright, now slow down

Guy: I love you babe

(in the paper the next day):
A motorcycle had crashed into a building because of brake failure. Two people were on it, but only 1 had survived.

The truth was that halfway down the road, the guy realized that his brakes broke, but he didn't want to let the girl know. Instead, he had her say she loved him and felt her hug one last time, then he had her wear his helmet so that she would live even though it meant that he would die.

just to show them that you would give your life for them
to have a love this strong is rare, so treasure everymoment, live laugh and love all you can

What is Love

Love it may only be a four letter word but it makes such a big difference to a persons life.
Love is when I hear from you and i want to jump for joy.
Love is when im around you and I can't get that smile of my face.
Love is when my heart beats it goes out of control.
Love is when I only ever think about you no matter what im doing.
Love is where I find myself writing little things about how much I love you
Most of all love is what I feel for you.

don't want to be hurt anymore

I put up with shit from my family
I dis my friends that dis you
I tell my friends that they don't know you like i do
now i'm thinking maby i don't know you like i thought i did.
Because the man i know wouldn't hurt me or make me cry, but this is exactly what you have done
You think that saying the words i love you makes everything ok but it don't.
I love you but i have had enough pain in my life.
So if your going to just cause me more pain i say this is the end.
I don't want it to be the end but it's up to you

my poem

I told you i loved you
You told me you loved me too
We could be so great
Just you and me
I love you with all my heart
Tell me how could it be
You make me happy
But sometimes you make me cry
You may not have a place in my life
But you will always have a place in my heart
I.L.Y and i always will

now im not with you

Every night i would go to sleep
Thinking about how much i love you
Now i go to sleep
Thinking how much i wish i had you again
i wish things were different
But there not
Every time i feel i got something good
It just blows right back in my face
You give me hope that someone actually loved me
And then you just take it away
Thats just not right
You say if i was to move closer thing could work
But i don't see that happening soon
And i no you wont wait
And i know i will be too late for you
I know you would want me to move on
But if only it was as easy as that
I told you i was afraid of getting my heart broken
And you told me you wouldn't
But you did
I do understand i truely do but if only ...
I will always think of if only ....

NASTY SEX JOKE

Okay so a guy is
near the
end of his
senior
year in high school.
Unfortunately,
he still has to share a room with his
younger
brother who is only 9
years
old.

One night, he decides to bring his
girlfriend home
for a little fun.
They
have bunk beds and the guy notices that
his little
brother is already
asleep
on the lower bunk, so he and his
girlfriend climb
up
to the top bunk.
As you
might expect things start to heat up.

The guy remembers that his little brother
is
sleeping below so he tells
his
girlfriend to whisper "lettuce" if she wants
it
harder and "tomato" if
she
wants a new position.

Lettuce!!!

Tomato!!!

Lettuce!!!

Tomato!!!

Lettuce!!!

Tomato!!!

She screams.

Lettuce!!!

Tomato!!!

Whoa!!!

PULL IT OUT!!!

PULL IT OUT NOW!!!

I can't get pregnant!

would you
guys stop making
sandwiches up there! You're getting
mayonnaise
all over my
face!*!*!*!*!

the sweetest boy ever

girl:
I love you.

- Boy:
Yeah I know everyone does!

-Girl:
Really?

- Boy:
Yeah...everyone of my friends that are girls tell me that everyday.

- Girl:
Oh...but am I only your friend?

- Boy:
No...you're my girlfriend...why?

- Girl:
So when I say I love you I really do mean it.

- Boy:
Yeah I know you do mean it...its just that you dont need to tell me that you love me anymore cuz I know you love me since the day we been together and i love you more each and everyday.

- Girl:
......

- Boy:
So wanna go somewhere tonight for our 7th anniversary?

- Girl:
Yeah...where?

- Boy:
I dont know...maybe movie then dinner?

-Girl:
Ok.

- Boy:
Ill pick you up after I get off and get ready ok?

- Girl:
Ok. What time do you get off?

- Boy:
In 2 hours and then I gotta go home and yeah get ready which takes about 15-20 mintues...

-Girl:
hey...I thought you didnt have work today...

- Boy:
One of my co-workers called in sick.

- Girl:
Oh okay! So ill see you around 7:30 then?

- Boy:
Yeah! and babe?

- Girl:
Yeah?

- Boy:
I love you.

- Girl:
I love you too!

- Boy:
Ok my manager is like looking at me so yeah.... i gotta go.

- Girl:
Ok bye.

- Boy:
Bye.

****************************

2 hours later...

The guy drives to his girlfriends house and walks up to the door and rings bell.

- Girl:
Hey! (gives a kiss to her boyfriend)

- Boy:
Wassup...you ready?

- Girl:
Um...wait...let me get my bag and we can go ok?

- Boy:
Ok.

They both watched a movie and ate dinner...once they were done eating they head back to the car but before she got into the car...

- Boy:
Wait! Can I blind fold you?

- Girl:
Why??!

- Boy:
Its a suprise.

- Girl:
What kind of suprise?

- Boy:
A big one.

- Girl:
Okay but only if you promise me that you will hold my hand while we're driving.

- Boy:
I promise.

- Girl:
Ok blind fold me...

So they drove off...........and then they stoped.

- Boy:
Ok we're here!

-Girl:
Where?

- Boy:
Wait let me walk you to the place!

- Girl:
What place?

- Boy:
Somewhere! (and gives a kiss to her on the lips)

- Girl:
Baby!...

The boy walks her to the place.

- Boy:
Ok...let me take the blind fold off.

- Girl:
Where are we?

He takes it off her and she opens her eyes and sees the view of the city and at that same spot...that's where he first asked her to be his girlfriend....

- Girl:
Omg...(tears come down)

- Boy:
Why are you crying?

- Girl:
This is where you first asked me out...

- Boy:
What are you doing the rest of your life? (he asked on his knees and after he says that...behind him...in the air it says "Will you marry me?" in fireworks)

- Girl:
(tears come down faster)

- Boy:
I wasnt at work when you called me...I was planning this whole thing!

- Girl:
Get up!

- Boy:
Yeah?

- Girl:
(kisses him)

- Boy:
Is that a yes or a no?

- Girl:
Yes.

BUT!

If you do repost this, you will have a relationship that will last as long as you want it to!

You have 3 minutes to repost this.

if your a girl repost this as "THE SWEETEST BOY EVER"

And if your a boy post as "WHAT I WOULD DO FOR MY GIRL

1) Would you flicker your eyelashes on my face so its like a butterfly landing?

2) Would you make up 'pet' names 4 each other and talk real cute?

3) Would you tell me that I'm sic in a cute voice when I'm obviously unwell?

4) Would you rub my back to make me feel better?

5) Would you get excited everytime I called?

6) Would you come out with me anytime of the day or night just coz I want 2 be with u?

7) Would you sit in a pub with me?? (sometimes I jus wana have a drink and leave)

8) Would you listen to my advice coz maybe I'm right?

9) Would you say that your all mine and keep your word?

10) Would you dress up everytime u see me coz u wanna impress me?

11) Would you watch a movie with me but not end up watching much of it?

12) Would you miss me if i was gone 4 a minute?

I actualy dont think he's asking much...

virgin worst nightmare

virgin girl asks her boyfriend to come over Friday night

and have dinner with her parents. Since this is such a

big event, the girl announces to her boyfriend that

after dinner, she would like to go out and make love

for the first time.

* * * * * * * * *

Well, the boy is ecstatic, but he has never had sex

before, so he takes a trip to the pharmacist to get

some condoms. He tells the pharmacist it's his first time and

the pharmacist helps the boy for about an hour.

He tells the boy everything there is to know about condoms and

sex.

* * * * * * * * *

At the register, the pharmacist asks the boy how many

condoms he'd like to buy, a 3-pack, 10-pack, or family

pack. The boy insists on the family pack because he

thinks he will be rather busy, it being his first time and all.

* * * * * * * * *

That night, the boy shows up at the girl's parents

house and meets his girlfriend at the door. "Oh, I'm

so excited for you to meet my parents, come on in!"

* * * * * * * * *

The boy goes inside and is taken to the dinner table

where the girl's parents are seated. The boy quickly

offers to say grace and bows his head.

* * * * * * * * *

A minute passes, and the boy is still deep in prayer,

with his head down.

* * * * * * * * *

10 minutes pass, and still no movement from the boy.

* * * * * * * * *

Finally, after 20 minutes with his head down, the

girlfriend leans over and whispers to the

boyfriend, "I had no idea you were this religious."

* * * * * * * *

The boy turns, and whispers back, "I had no idea your

father was a pharmacist."

* * * * * * * * *

invisible

I cry teras that nobody wants to see
I cut, nobody seems to care
I bleed and nobodies there for me
I have scars that nobody see's
It doesn't matter what i do
Because to them i am simply
Invisible cut bleed, scar invisible

A Special World

A special world for you and me
A special bond one cannot see
It wraps us up in its cocoon
And holds us fiercely in its womb.

Its fingers spread like fine spun gold
Gently nestling us to the fold
Like silken thread it holds us fast
Bonds like this are meant to last.

And though at times a thread may break
A new one forms in its wake
To bind us closer and keep us strong
In a special world, where we belong.

your name

Your Name

I wrote your name in the sky,
but the wind blew it away.
I wrote your name in the sand,
but the waves washed it away.
I wrote your name in my heart,
and forever it will stay.

Confusion of Love

Those simple words confuse me.
For I thought I knew what they meant.
Until I lost and won some,
My love today is for rent.

I love you.

Those simple words I know so well.
I wish for you to know.
That just liking someone is so different.
So I will say it real slow.

I L O V E Y O U

Those are the words of a million feelings.
My hopes and dreams and joys.
Little girls writing love letters.
Chasing after boys.

I…L…O…V…E…Y…O…U

Those are the words that I say to you.
I whisper them to your heart.
You turn and look back at me.
I loved you from the start

You

You kissed my lips and I felt a flutter in my heart,
You touched my hand and lit a spark in my body,
You stared into my eyes and saw straight into my soul,
You put your arms around me and I was finally complete.
